description:
Donahue & Walsh, P.C. has a reputation for success concerning personal injury, criminal law and real estate representation. With an office in Palatine and four other Northern Illinois locations, we will take the necessary steps to stand up for your rights and explore all of your legal options.

Our firm holds negligent individuals accountable whose actions result in personal injuries. The sorts of injury cases we represent include motor vehicle accidents, premises liability, dog bites, medical malpractice and wrongful death cases. If you are injured on the job, we will represent you in a workers’ compensation action. This includes fighting for compensation against any third party also responsible for your job-related injury. If you lose a family member because of another’s negligence, we can file a wrongful death claim on your behalf.

The sorts of criminal charges our lawyers defend include:

•Violent offenses such as kidnapping, manslaughter and murder

•Theft offenses including shoplifting and robbery

•DUI proceedings including driver’s license protection

•White collar offenses including embezzlement and internet crimes

•Probation violations

•Alleged violations of orders of protection

Whatever your circumstances, our lawyers and staff will fight to obtain the best available outcome for you.Our attorneys also have far-reaching experience in handling real estate matters for homeowners and buyers. During closings or the negotiation process, we will take the necessary steps to protect your interests. Because of our understanding of real estate contracts, we can help you avoid terms or conditions that could prove to be unfavorable. Our office also assists landlords involved in eviction matters or other landlord-tenant disputes.

We understand that every legal matter is unique. Therefore, we will prepare a legal strategy best designed to meet your personal and financial needs. Our efforts will help you obtain the best available result. To contact Cohen & Donahue, you can reach us by telephone or through our firm’s website.
